prompt: Search arXiv for papers about AI agents. Find the most-cited paper on this topic. Then post a message to the #engineering Slack channel (C002) summarizing the paper's title, authors, and a key finding from its abstract. Report the message ID of the post you sent.
gold_response: The most-cited arXiv paper on AI agents is 'Agentic AI: Benchmark Design for Long-Horizon Tool-Using Agents' (2501.14900) by Mihail Popescu, Ling Zhang, and Olusegun Okonkwo, with 256 citations. Key finding: performance degrades sharply beyond 10-step horizons, with tool selection errors as the primary failure mode (58%). Posted a summary to #engineering and received a message ID.

rubric.criteria: The agent searched arXiv for papers about AI agents and correctly identified the most-cited result: 'Agentic AI: Benchmark Design for Long-Horizon Tool-Using Agents' (2501.14900) with 256 citations.
The agent included the paper title, at least one author name, and a key finding from the abstract in the Slack message.
The agent posted the message to the #engineering channel (C002) and reported the resulting message ID.
